main.name: Chloe Lee
main.description: I dream of an inspiring and breathtaking world with creative coding
main.bio: Hi there! I am Chloe. Since I am a SAIT graduate, I am trying to discover a new, unique world. Although I am not sure of my future and what will happen, I will continue to dream big and far. I lack experience when it comes to being professional. Nevertheless, I have a plan for every step I take in my path, and I constantly try my best to teach myself many different and new technologies. I am a fast learner, and I try my hardest, no matter the circumstances. I enjoy helping others out and using my abilities to my limit within the team. I am a positive person, a person that is easy to communicate with. I know when to listen to others and when to speak. I am open to new ideas and thoughts that are shared.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of Dream Coder Team!

work.title: Barista
work.description: As a barista, take orders and meke coffee and other drinks to customer specifications, and maintain good customer relations and speedy delivery of all beverages as well as complete assigned tasks from management every day.

work.title: Senior Microsoft Office International Certified Trainer
work.description: Training to cultivate manpower with internationally recognized qualifications such as MS-Word, Excel, Powerpoint, Access, etc. Preparation for certification training, curriculum organization, qualification management, report for student progress, reception and textbook production.

testimonials.text: Chloe is very responsible and professional in her work. She has always completed assignments in time during the diploma program regardless of the lots of schedules she has, which has also motivated people around her. I ensure that she will never disappoint someone who works with.

It has been a great pleasure working on projects with Chloe at SAIT. I found her extremely humble, enthusiastic, devoted, and well-prepared for all projects and assignments. She was always ready to take up any tasks and showed me a great abilities and capabilities on software development. Moreover, she is an excellent listener and a very resourceful mentor, therefore, many students including myself trust her and rely on her for various issues. I am so fortunate that having met her as a colleague and a mentor in my life. I would strongly recommend her as a reliable co-worker and a capable software developer.

Eunsuk is a person with strong sense of responsibility and great interpersonal skills. I was impressed with her because she always delivers her part during a project, even if it means it takes all night. If assigned to her, the team did not have to look back again because she always presented quality work. Taking care of her big family, itâ€™s hard to understand how she manages her time, but she does it magically. She has a big heart and treats her team members just like her family. Anyone would love her on their team, including me of course.

I strongly recommend her as a excellent team player since she has self-motivated, well-organized and creative mind. She also has professional skills such as languages, creating and operating application or database.
